Bluetooth 5.4, A2DP, LE | water_resist = IP68 | other = | sar = | hac = | website = * {{URL|https://www.mi.com/xiaomi-14/}} * {{URL| https://www.mi.com/xiaomi-14-pro/}} | references = {{cite web |url= https://www.gsmarena.com/xiaomi_14-12626.php|title= Xiaomi 14|last= |first= |date= 1 November 2023|website= GSMArena|publisher= |access-date= |quote=}}{{cite web |url= https://www.gsmarena.com/xiaomi_14_pro-12643.php|title= Xiaomi 14 Pro|last= |first= |date= 1 November 2023|website= GSMArena|publisher= |access-date= |quote=}} }} The '''Xiaomi 14''' is a series of [[Android (operating system)|Android]]-based [[smartphone]]s manufactured by [[Xiaomi]] that succeeds the [[Xiaomi 13]] series. The series is the company's flagship{{Cite web |title=The Xiaomi 14 is probably coming to Europe, but the 14 Pro might not |url=https://www.techadvisor.com/article/1985782/xiaomi-14.html |access-date=2024-02-01 |website=Tech Advisor |language=en}} range. The Xiaomi 14 and 14 Pro, the first phones to feature a [[Qualcomm Snapdragon]] 8 Gen 3 [[System On Chip]],{{cite web |url= https://indianexpress.com/article/technology/tech-news-technology/snapdragon-8-gen-3-soc-powered-smartphones-8998475/|title= From OnePlus 12 to Xiaomi 14: Smartphones confirmed to feature Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC|last= |first= |date= 1 November 2023|website=|publisher= |access-date= |quote=}} were announced on 26 October 2023 and were released in [[China]] on 1 November 2023. The Xiaomi 14 Ultra was released on February 22, 2024 in China alongside the Xiaomi Pad 6S Pro.{{Cite news |date=February 23, 2024 |title=The Xiaomi 14 Ultra is now official: will it dominate the 2024 camera phone arena? |url=https://www.phonearena.com/news/xiaomi-14-ultra-is-official_id155629 |work=[[PhoneArena]]}} The global launch of the Xiaomi 14 series happened at MWC 2024 on February 25, 2024 in Barcelona, Spain.{{Cite web |title=Xiaomi 14 series release date officially announced on February 25 in Barcelona |url=https://crazreview.com/xiaomi-14-series-release-date-announced/ |access-date=February 24, 2024 |website=[[CrazReview]]|date=7 February 2024 }} == See also == * [[List of large sensor camera phones]] * [[List of longest smartphone telephoto lenses]] == References == {{reflist}} == External links == {{Xiaomi}} {{mobile-phone-stub}} [[Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2023]] [[Category:Android (operating system) devices]] [[Category:Flagship smartphones]] [[Category:Xiaomi smartphones|14]] [[Category:Mobile phones with multiple rear cameras]] [[Category:Mobile phones with 8K video recording]]
